page_content: Discusses a legal and administrative issue related to the Gemeinde Schmitten's educational partnerships.
Describes the responsibilities and services offered by the Amt für Gemeinden in the areas of municipal supervision, financial management, and structural reforms.
Discusses a new traffic safety campaign aimed at reducing motorcycle accidents in Graubünden.
Discusses financial and administrative decisions, including the lack of a cost-of-living adjustment for cantonal employees and teachers.
Discusses new regulations for the compensation of lawyers in official defenses and free legal representations.
